website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a ductless, multi-zone cooling and heating system, this one tops the charts in efficiency, quality, and features. Hands down the best on the market.
pros: A complete cooling and heat pump 4-zone system that provides up to 38,500 BTU cooling and 38,000 BTU heating capabilities
Ductless units are efficient and feature WiFi remote access
cons: Also a little challenging to install

customer_reviews.title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Had unit stalled by licensed HVAC installer per directions. They discovered that the main control board was bad. Contacted the seller multiple times about a replacement part and have gotten very little help and no answers about when the part will be available. Absolutely the worst customer service ever.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike.... Piece of crap the colder outside .the more it shuts of to defrost. At 20 degree f. It stops every couple of hours. 10 minutes nothing. House gets colder each time. Would never recommend system or high seer. Terry .
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Help desk is unable to provide a company to do repairs
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased for my mothers small, 2 bedroom home. We’ve had the units for about 18 months and constantly having issues. When contacting Pioneer to get a resolution we continued to get the runaround. We cannot find someone that works with the company to repair the units. We hired 2 different companies to try to repair and both told us we needed to reach Pioneer so they can locate the nearest company that can work on the units. We were given 2 phone numbers. One line went to voicemail repeatedly and the other was a dead line. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two years and 2 grand later, I'll be replacing this garbage unit
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was user error. But the issues continued to mount, and my aggravation level followed suit. I have fought this damn thing since the day I had it installed, and after 8 service calls at a couple hundred bucks a piece, countless hours on the phone, and an unsatisfactory level of sustained comfort in my home, this POS is going in the garbage. Luckily, I purchased the extended warranty, so hopefully the cost of something else will be offset by that. Stay far, far away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Best minisplit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best minisplit for the money. Insulated line set and wiring make for hassle free install. I am a hvac contractor and prefer these units over the ones available at my regular distributors. Great Customer service as well
customer_reviews.author: dwayne childers

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective--it did not maintain temperature. Warranty department wanted me to pay a tech to check the product and describe where the defect was and then report it to the warranty department. Vendor took no responsibility at all. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nreno

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works real good. I had to lengthen one of the line set and added the recommended amount of refrigerant. It is operating with the original central heat pump as lead unit and on most days it is able to maintain temp 90% of the time for the whole house. It has been operating daily for a month now and so far no glitch.
customer_reviews.author: Jjz757

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to run and hook everything up. All lines are pre charged with the AC liquid stuff. I hired a professional to bleed the lines of air and pressurize the unit lines. U can even do that urself as they give u the instructions just need the equipment to do it so decided to let a professional handle that part. The units work well. Used this system on my top floor to each room. 3 bedrooms and 1 hallway. I even bought the wifi adapter for each unit and can now control them through my phone no mater where I'm at.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bucci Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was done in one day. I ordered 2 splits one for the ground floor and one for the 2nd floor. The places where the splits were installed did not have easy access to the main unit so it was a complicated installation. The splits work very smooth you can hardly hear any noice, as well as the unit outside. For houses that did not have central A/C this is a great solution. There was not a big increase in the electrical bill so, on the energy efficiency side also is very good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Yep...
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the line sets from the indoor section and the outdoor unit aren’t the same size. Which means they didn’t fit. Giant pain in the rear. Running around in the middle of Covid trying to find adapter parts. I would not recommend. I’d also suggest to the seller finding a new shipping company. That was a whole other set of circus monkeys.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holman

customer_reviews.title: Business Practices Out of Whack
customer_reviews.text: A duel system, one unit had a terrible internal leak after one day. Now I'm waiting on the "warranty" dept. to make a decision. Now I have to remove the unit and pay my A/C guy to re-charge it as well.... The other unit seems to work great but not to sure about their business procedures....No return calls and after numerous calls by myself, I still had to send an email to their "warranty" dept. Why is it a company can't take care of their factory defects without running their customers ragged?
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet outdoor unit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet outdoor unit and 2 indoor units. Took 10 hours for professional installation cost $1400. I’m very happy with purchase. Prompt delivery. Cooled down my guest house immediately in 90 degree weather. Definitely a good value if you can get a quote on installation beforehand. Contractors wanted $7000 if they purchased and installed. Purchase unit yourself and shop installation cost around and save big time.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: 2 units and they cannot heat or cool the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and had them professionally installed in a 1,000 sq ft house. 2 units and they cannot heat or cool the house. They barely blow at all and do not ever shutoff. Upstairs is only 300 sq ft and in the summer it is way to hot. I'm hoping customer service will fix them by sending new units so that i dont have to buy 2 more window units (already have 2 installed).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Inside Units
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit(s) installed for about a year now. Both inside units make bearing noises that are not easily fixed. Other than the noise, the units work well. I've had these units for 3 years now. I'm going into my 4th summer of cooling. They're very very noisy and the compression fittings wound up leaking coolant. I've had multiple mechanics come to fix the units. If I had to do it all over again I would have gone with a Mitsubishi unit.
customer_reviews.author: JimboNC

customer_reviews.title: CANT SAY ENOUGH GOOD THINGS
customer_reviews.text: My contractor asked me to buy an AC unit for my sunroom but not much info. Started doing some research and found this. I have ordered it, it has been delivered and people keep asking me where I got it from, INCLUDING my contractor
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations from the customer service to the unit. Thanks Highseer.
customer_reviews.text: It's been installed for about a week now and I am thrilled with it. It's quite and consistently controlling the temperature. From the customer service to the quick shipping I have been impressed by Highseer. Definitely will be recommended by me
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I had the unit installed by a licensed HAVC contractor and there is a problem with the unit and I talked to the manufacture and they said the unit needed to be replaced or repair.. I have been calling 2 twice a week and just get voice mails and no one calls me back!!!! So after spending thousands on the unit and 2 thousand on the install I have a big paper wait. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: A. Courselle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ez install, fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing unit. I have a pretty good grasp of most diy jobs, but have very little hvac experience. It took me just a couple of evenings after work to install and have this dual zone system up and running. Its almost silent and more than enough to cover my small home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: They sell defective products y want u to repair it for them y make u wait for weeks to send u the parts if u want a piece of garbage u are in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: enrique paz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using I commercially and it is holding up well. Only been in for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: the unit has stop working after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: the unit was working fine but it stopped hot and cold. not it costs more to fix it than getting a new one
customer_reviews.author: hosein M. Oskouei

customer_reviews.title: Every thing went great except for the draining pipe wasn't the same footage ...
customer_reviews.text: Every thing went great except for the draining pipe wasn't the same footage as the piping kit. Drainage pipe was 15 ft shorter. Went crazy to find the same. Needed to improvise after days trying to find the same piping it was impossible. Found something similar at 1.50 per ft. Too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Grace S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Complete kit has everything but the mounting pad or brackets. Gave it a 4 star because the manuals are not great. But it fired up and has been working great. I have had some issues with one of the indoor units, called highseer and they shipped the part to me for only the shipping charges. They were very responsive and knowledgeable shipped the same day and if you can install one of these you can definitely change the components
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and no surprises
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very very quiet. Great to have heating and cooling in wack room. Only possible negative it's that it is not easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: jrgloneduckxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Good units so far
customer_reviews.text: Good units so far. Impressed on how quiet they are and efficient. Now to see how long they last before I have a problem. I would recommend them at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations works really good and it's nice and quiet and I'm going to get them again
customer_reviews.author: Frank Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inverter did not start up! Hvac guy had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Inverter did not start up! Hvac guy had to trouble shoot the issue, I need to order a replacement or please send me a tech out! It’s not a proper functioning inverter, has issues
customer_reviews.author: Hans P Jossi

customer_reviews.title: This system is awesome. I don't know my A from my elbow ...
customer_reviews.text: This system is awesome. I don't know my A from my elbow about A/C. But this baby keeps me cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More is better
customer_reviews.text: Initially installed 9000 but unit in extension,was so impressed,ordered this 30,000 but unit for remainder of first floor.very quiet,helps to be married to havoc guy,easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think it will be just what I needed, an economic way of heating my newly renovated basement.
customer_reviews.author: Annette H.

customer_reviews.title: The malfunction code reads "PO" which is a signal for bad compression. It starts then stops
customer_reviews.text: It's arrived. I've spent money on it and the compression doesn't work. It's 90 degrees and I've had a non working $2000 unit. Very very frustrating and disappointing. The malfunction code reads "PO" which is a signal for bad compression. It starts then stops. How does that happen on a brand new unit? This needs to be repaired asap.
customer_reviews.author: Tinafarristours

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrreat.  love this unit  and  am getting another one
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law and I installed this tri unit in my bedrooms in about 4 hours. we ordered separately the line set covers to make the outside appearance nice and clean, they took a bit to make look nice but all worked out. The unit I got runs 3 9000 btu heads 1 in each bedroom. In less that 2 hours after being completed you could tell the difference in the whole house. if you are on the fence about the ductless system GET IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These unites are great for heat as well as cooling.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a year to write this review. The unite works very well for heat and AC. Last year we had some days 10deg and the unite kept my house 72deg with out any issues. I calculated the cost to heat my house to be $730 this year. The year before using electric baseboard heat $2340 keeping the house at 65deg. Here in south jersey electric is very expensive at $0.22kwh so the unite has paid for its self already in savings on my electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 year and the board went out
customer_reviews.text: main board went out , since june 6th 2019 . Pioneer said the part on back order and 2-3 weeks. now almost 2 months and they keep saying anyday now yada yada. dont buy pioneer . cause when it breaks , good luck getting parts
customer_reviews.author: Kraka

customer_reviews.title: So quiet you won’t know it’s on.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Super quiet. Nearly silent. Really efficient. I couldn’t be happier. I converted my workshop to be able to work from home. I added the WiFi chipset to the head units and now I can schedule the settings I want and get notified when it turns on and off. It’s pretty great. Even with these 90-100 degree days it’s been able to keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Golinski

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little unit, super quiet, and easy to install. After you order you have to call support and tell them the length of copper line you want then pay them the difference. It's not very much. To install on your own - you will need an HVAC vacuum pump and lines. The system does come precharged with refrigerant.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Diy success
customer_reviews.text: Only installed 2 indoor units so far and the house has never felt better. I replace a five ton Central air unit with it. The house has never been quieter. It was a great diy project. I requested the 12k units and that is what they sent. I should have asked for one twenty five foot line set. My mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We put these in our cabin. Easy to install. Way cheaper than adding ducts. Quite. Keeps it cool in the summer and warm in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The install went well and had everything needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The install went well and had everything needed to install it. I have installed several units and bought the Pioneer because I installed one for friends and was impressed by the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton  Swan

customer_reviews.title: works great but take installation price into account
customer_reviews.text: It is very efficient in terms of how fast it cools the room, very quiet, and easy to control. I love the unit and how it works. You just need to make sure you find someone to install it for you or know how to install it yourself because the service that comes with it on Amazon is horrible. You cannot install it for the price offered. You think that for this price you can get it installed but then when a technician arrives at your house, the installation price doubles - this is what happened to us.
customer_reviews.author: Nymph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great split zone system! Very quiet. Fob works great. A great system.
customer_reviews.author: Clay is Retired

customer_reviews.title: Total Scam
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Outdoor unit stopped working, is under warranty, and the company is absolutely unwilling to help me. Now I have a $2,000 fan on my wall. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cody R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved is so great no noise nice to install I save a lot money tknyou
customer_reviews.author: nestor a figueroa

customer_reviews.title: This review is for AWFUL amazon home services. No ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for AWFUL amazon home services. No show! I had called and emailed several times with no concrete service time (out of three I selected). Ultimately, they flaked today, two days before the scheduled time. If I had known weeks ago when I’d purchased and received the product, I would have made an appointment with someone. Additionally most places don’t install pre-purchased equipment. Now my house is cold in the dead of winter without help from Amazon. Awful!!! Still don’t know how the Pioneer system works so I will mark 5 stars for them for now.
customer_reviews.author: kara cooperr

customer_reviews.title: item should come with everything needed to instull without having ...
customer_reviews.text: item should come with everything needed to instull without having to purchase additional items, and should come with all items listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Time Installing Mini Split
customer_reviews.text: I just made the purchase and have not had it installed. It should arrive early next week and I will provide and update on how installation and the first weeks of operation goes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hamilton

product_meta.title: PIONEER Air Conditioner Pioneer Multi Split Heat Pump, Quad (4 Zone)
product_meta.description: Size:Quad Split (4 Zone)Pioneer brand multi split heat pump system, complete set. System components include: one multi zone outdoor unit, matching multiple wall mount indoor units, piping and accessory kits and remote controllers. Pioneer multi split systems are available in 4 versions for 2, 3, 4 and 5 zones. They provide totally decentralized and independent zone control for perfect climate in each zone or room. Each zone can be individually and independently set to be on or off, or to run with different temperature settings (only exception is that system can not run both heating and cooling modes simultaneously for different zones). each indoor unit can be chosen from 3 different capacities 9, 12 and 18000 BTU, to match the zone loads. Indoor units automatically adjust their capacities up and down in real time and as needed to match the zone's cooling or heating loads. The outdoor unit will also adjust its total output based on the total demand it receives from all simultaneously running indoor units in real time. This function results in significant energy savings. Systems use single point power entry to the outdoor unit only and indoor units receive their power from the outdoor unit. Multi split systems and complex systems to install for an individual without proper tools and training. Installation of such systems must be performed or supervised by a capable professional. Systems can be customized for the indoor unit Capacity combination as well as the pipe kit lengths for each zone. The standard price includes the system matched 12, 000 BTU wall mounted indoor units and 16 foot pipe kits. Variations can result in small cost changes which needs to be paid separately to the supplier. Please call 800-243-0340 immediately after placing your order, if you require any customizations. Please also visit high seer com web site for full technical specks and other documents provided.
feature_bullets: Ultra high efficiency inverter++ ductless multi split quad (4) zone heat pump system
Cooling capacity: 8, 190~38, 500 btu/hr. Min. /max. With 22. 5 seer efficiency
Heating capacity: 4, 940~38, 000 btu/hr. Min. /max. With 10. 3 hspf efficiency
Voltage: 208~230 volts, 60 hertz, 1 phase (standard household 2 line power, l1-l2-g)
Carefully see all available pictures, where a full specifications table is also provided
